COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc
STRING: I had a quick lunch, slung my Fortelle over my shoulder,
and went outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x108
STRING: I ignored the constant rain, and hurried to Torta's house.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e
STRING: The area of the house I was heading to existed
alongside rows of apartments built for students like me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e
STRING: There were many charming old buildings, and the one
that Ninna bought to live here was no exception.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15e
STRING: It was pretty close to my apartment, so I could walk
there in five minutes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x174
STRING: I walked toward the comparatively large building across
the way, sandwiched between two thin alleys.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c2
STRING: [Torta] “Just a minute.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20c
STRING: [Torta] “Come in.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x222
STRING: I was greeted by a smiling Torta, and went inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you for inviting me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x266
STRING: I took a step into the room with its nostalgic smell.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x272
STRING: It was the kind of place that made me feel homesick
every time I came.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a0
STRING: [Ninna] “Is that you, Chris...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b6
STRING: I heard a chair creak, and Ninna called out to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cc
STRING: [Chris] “Yes... It's been a long time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e2
STRING: Sat in a bentwood chair, Ninna rocked slowly as she
turned to face me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x314
STRING: [Ninna] “Come closer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32a
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, ma'am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x340
STRING: I moved closer as she asked, and touched her deeply
wrinkled hand on the arm rest.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35e
STRING: [Ninna] “You've gotten so big.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x374
STRING: [Chris] “It's only been half a year. I can't grow that fast.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b0
STRING: [Ninna] “There's that adult tone again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3da
STRING: She said this in a graceful voice, and looked me in the
eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e6
STRING: No, the truth is she was just trying to look.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f2
STRING: Her narrow eyes couldn't open very wide and were
clouded white. They almost couldn't see.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x424
STRING: [Torta] “Right. It doesn't suit you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43a
STRING: A long time ago, I called Ninna Grandma as Torta did,
and she still talked about it like it was yesterday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45a
STRING: I didn't mind being treated that way at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x466
STRING: But I was getting to the point where being treated like a
child was humiliating. I was also at an age when I had
to be polite to an extent.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x486
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, thank you for having me today. It might
get a little loud...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ae
STRING: [Ninna] “That's fine. You're going to play here, then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c4
STRING: [Chris] “Um, yes I am...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4da
STRING: I thought we'd practice in Torta's room, but it seemed it
would be better not to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50c
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, we're going to practice here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52a
STRING: [Ninna] “I see. That's good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55a
STRING: Ninna slowly leaned back in her chair, making herself
comfortable in order to listen to the music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x570
STRING: I had the feeling I was being urged on, and got my
Fortelle ready right away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a2
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, you're quite serious today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b8
STRING: [Chris] “As always... Well, maybe that's overstating it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f4
STRING: Ninna's body shook with silent laughter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x600
STRING: Slightly regretting not visiting for so long, I vowed
secretly to play more seriously than usual today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x63c
STRING: First, I lightly arranged my fingers on the keys and
struck a chord.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x65c
STRING: The clear sound of the Fortelle rang out in the room,
and Ninna faced me slightly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x672
STRING: The house itself was large, and there wasn't anyone in
the area that would complain about the noise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x688
STRING: I repositioned myself slightly so Ninna could hear better,
and faced Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c0
STRING: Which reminded me that we hadn't practiced facing
each other yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d6
STRING: As we were more directly in each other's line of sight
than usual, I felt shy for some reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ec
STRING: In an attempt to ensure that at least Ninna didn't catch
on to my newfound bashfulness, I called out to Torta in
a slightly glum tone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x702
STRING: [Chris] “Mm... I'm ready.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x734
STRING: [Torta] “My voice is already warmed up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x74a
STRING: In Torta's room on the second floor was an upright
piano, just like the one at her parent's place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x760
STRING: She must have warmed up before noon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x76c
STRING: I guess that meant she was well prepared...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x778
STRING: Maybe she knew how lazy I was and was trying to
practice for a long as possible.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x78e
STRING: [Chris] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b8
STRING: I let out a big breath, and met Torta's eyes directly in
front of me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c4
STRING: We didn't need a signal to start.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d0
STRING: I breathed in at the same time as her, then gradually
struck the keys.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x816
STRING: The room here seemed to be built with no
consideration for acoustics, but Torta's voice still rang
out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x834
STRING: The sound bounced off the walls and got a little loud,
but she had enough power to drown that out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x852
STRING: Then her voice, different from the voice I usually heard
coming from behind me in practice, fused with the
Fortelle, and created a true harmony.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x870
STRING: Ninna was motionless as if she were sleeping, just
letting the waves of music wash over her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x88e
STRING: At some point we even forgot Ninna was there, and
became a part of the music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x89a
STRING: Then...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8bc
STRING: We snapped out of the seemingly endless illusion like it
never existed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d2
STRING: We stayed motionless for a while.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f0
STRING: Then Ninna spoke, to break the momentary silence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x922
STRING: [Ninna] “Chris, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x938
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, ma'am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x96a
STRING: [Torta] “What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x988
STRING: [Ninna] “You've gotten good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b2
STRING: Those were her only words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9be
STRING: But it was plenty for us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ca
STRING: I was oddly happy, and thought about playing
something else.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f4
STRING: But Torta sent me a gaze signaling for me to stop.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa1c
STRING: [Torta] “Grandma. We have to practice now...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa44
STRING: [Ninna] “Yes, do as you like. I'll get the food ready.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa62
STRING: [Torta] “Right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa78
STRING: [Chris] “Why...? We could play another song or
something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa96
STRING: [Ninna] “It's fine. I don't want to get in the way of your
practice. Just practice as you always do and stay until
nighttime; that's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xadc
STRING: [Torta] “Like she says.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf2
STRING: [Chris] “Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb10
STRING: [Ninna] “Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb3a
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sorry. I really did mean to visit more often.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb62
STRING: [Ninna] “I'm just happy to have you come whenever you
want to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb86
STRING: Saying only this, Ninna walked to the kitchen, as if she
didn't care what we did after that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb9c
STRING: It was like she was silently telling us we didn't have to
worry about her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb2
STRING: Her steps were so light, you'd never think she was
nearly blind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc8
STRING: She was healthy enough to provide for herself, and
cooking was always Ninna's job.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbde
STRING: After making sure Ninna's steady steps had taken her
into the kitchen, I faced Torta again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc18
STRING: [Torta] “Let's not go upstairs yet. We'll practice here
instead so she can hear us from the kitchen.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc38
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... That's a good idea.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6a
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah. Let's start with the part that's hard for
you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc80
STRING: [Chris] “No, we can start with what you need to work
on, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb2
STRING: [Torta] “Grr.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc8
STRING: [Chris] “You said it first.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcec
STRING: As our pointless argument continued, we heard snorts
of laughter from the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd02
STRING: For some reason that made me comfortable, and I
thought this was just fine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd4c
STRING: As the three of us rested after dinner, the time passed
quickly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd62
STRING: Because I only visited a couple times a year, we just
talked about what was going on with me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd82
STRING: Ninna wanted to know trivial things that I wouldn't talk
about even to Torta, and we ended up talking until very
late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd98
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, it's getting late; I should be going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdca
STRING: [Ninna] “Chris, thank you so much for today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xde0
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sorry I can't visit more often.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf6
STRING: At some point my tone had gotten familiar, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe02
STRING: Every time I came I tried to be polite, but I was always
this familiar by the time I went home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe20
STRING: [Ninna] “Don't go out of your way. It's fine if you come
when you want to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe36
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4c
STRING: I answered honestly, without overdoing it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe58
STRING: Ninna nodded slowly, and finally took my hand once
again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe8c
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, see you tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea2
STRING: Standing in the doorway, Torta murmured at the end so
only I could hear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeca
STRING: [Torta] “Thanks for today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee0
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... See you tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf04
STRING: I inhaled the nostalgic smell of the room deeply one
more time, and went outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf34
STRING: The falling rain was cold, so I put on my coat again, and
hurried home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf86
STRING: [Phorni] “You're late...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf9c
STRING: [Chris] “I'm home. Sorry I'm late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfba
STRING: [Phorni] “What about your reply to Arie? Do you have
time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd0
STRING: [Chris] “You're worried about our ensemble, Phorni, not
my reply to the letter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100c
STRING: [Phorni] “Mm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1022
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry... I'm pretty tired today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1054
STRING: [Phorni] “What are you talking about? Hurry up and
write your reply...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106a
STRING: [Chris] “When I think about tomorrow, all I can really
manage is writing the letter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x109c
STRING: [Phorni] “What?! We really can't play, then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b2
STRING: [Chris] “Next week... We'll play twice as much, forgive
me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e4
STRING: [Phorni] “I waited for you and everything...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10fa
STRING: [Chris] “I'm really sorry about that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112c
STRING: [Phorni] “Grr... Fine!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1158
STRING: I couldn't do anything about Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1164
STRING: Maybe I could play with her a little tomorrow, even
though it wasn't Sunday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x117a
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sorry... Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1190
STRING: I didn't know if she could hear me, but I apologized
quietly, and decided to forget it for the time being.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a6
STRING: [Chris] “Now then...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11bc
STRING: I did talk for a long time, but I was still full from dinner,
and was struggling to stay awake while I opened the
letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d2
STRING: Looking at the neatly lined up letters gave me a feeling
of relief, threatening to make me sleepy again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e8
STRING: I wanted to relax a little, so I lay on the bed to read
the letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1236
STRING: Chris. No doubt it's still raining there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1254
STRING: The rain that started last week has since stopped, and
the weather is now shamelessly nice again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1272
STRING: Sometimes I wonder how endless rain would make me
feel.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1290
STRING: If I could take even a little of your rain and bring it here,
I'd do so happily.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b0
STRING: I feel like I can see you laughing at me for saying
something so silly, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ce
STRING: But that's honestly how I feel.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e2
STRING: How is the search for your graduation recital partner?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f6
STRING: I'm sorry to bring this up again, but it's the most
important thing right now, so forgive me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1314
STRING: Even if it's not Torta, no matter who it is, your
graduation is on the line, so it's important.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1332
STRING: I hope you find someone good soon and start
practicing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1346
STRING: It would be pretty sad to only talk about that, so I'll
write about myself a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1366
STRING: I started working at this bakery at the same time that
you and Torta entered the music school, so it's already
been over two and a half years.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x138e
STRING: I'm happy to report that I am now able to bake bread
from start to finish by myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ac
STRING: I'm very busy every day, but it's fulfilling, and I think I'm
working just as hard as you, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ca
STRING: I hope I can serve you some of the delicious bread I
make someday, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e8
STRING: I'm eagerly awaiting that day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1406
STRING: Love, Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1444
STRING: Bread made by Arietta...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1450
STRING: I didn't really want to think about food, with my full
stomach, but I was sure I could manage that much.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1466
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x147c
STRING: I set the letter by the bed, and muttered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1488
STRING: [Chris] “Wake me up a little early tomorrow... I can't
even write a reply.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ae
STRING: I buried my face in the pillow and was in dreamland in
no time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ba
STRING: [Chris] “Good night...”
